title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.5 - Age requirements for care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.5 - Age requirements for care

State Regulations

An authorized agency may admit into any program of care a
child actually or apparently under the age of 18, and may continue to care for
such child until the age of 21. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
441.5

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
